title: Affection & Touch

questions.text: When it comes to PDA (public displays of affection), I'm comfortable with...
choices: All of it - hand holding, kisses, the works
Some affection - hand holding, arm around each other
Keeping it subtle in public, more affectionate in private
Not really a PDA person - save it for when we're alone

questions.text: For cuddling on the couch, my ideal situation is...
choices: Fully intertwined - the closer the better
Leaning on each other or side by side
Touching but with some personal space
I like my own spot, but close by

questions.text: When I've had a tough day, physical comfort looks like...
choices: A long hug that makes everything better
Sitting close while we talk about it
Just being near you is enough
I might need a little space first, then closeness

questions.text: Little physical gestures that mean a lot to me are...
choices: Random kisses throughout the day
A hand on my back or shoulder
Playing with my hair or gentle touches
Holding hands when we're out together

questions.text: When it comes to how much physical affection feels right, I'd say...
choices: I'm very affectionate - more is more
I like regular affection but not constantly
I show love in other ways more than physical touch
It depends on my mood and energy

description: Discover your love language when it comes to touch and affection.
